original_text: But they did not understand the saying, and were afraid to ask him.
korean_text: 그러나 제자들은 이 말씀을 깨닫지 못하고 묻기도 두려워하더라

sentences.original_text: But they did not understand the saying
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 그 말씀을 이해하지 못했다

sentences.original_text: and were afraid to ask him.
